title: [K-12] LSTM-Based Instructional Design Automation Implementation Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational instructional design theories and understanding of machine learning concepts
context.additional_context: Intensive training environment focused on hands-on practice using personal devices.

learning_goals: Learners can design a learning outcome prediction model using LSTM neural network architectures.
Learners can develop an automated instructional design system that reflects educational contexts (time, resources, social environment).
Learners can propose strategies to optimize learning outcomes based on predefined ontologies and educational models.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
